column2: map_income <- tm_shape(na.omit(london_polygon)) + tm_polygons("household_median_income_thousands", tm_scale_continuous(values="Purples"), col_alpha = 0, tm_legend(title="", frame=FALSE)) + tm_layout(frame=FALSE, legend.text.size=1, legend.reverse = TRUE)
